alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 2:26PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, except 1 to 7 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...The Sawtooth Mountains and Stanley Basin, and the Sun Valley Region. Heavy snow (6 inches or more) should remain above 7500 feet elevation. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
